channel.title: Hi, I am Ashish, solo founder of UberCX, commerce web services
channel.description:
Hi all, Long time lurker, finally I left my job and started my own startup **ubercx.io** This startup is on path to provide APIs (or web services) on cloud. APIs provide business intelligence for e-commerce retailers. We recently launched very first API product "show shipping tracking details" embedded on customer order detail page. It's not niche concept, but we aim to provide similar APIs under same company. Of course, we also provide free plugins, integrated with major platforms like Magento, Shopify & WooCommerce. (We have plans to add more platforms). Also soon we will be launching more APIs (along with their plugins). We offer FREE plan too (http://ubercx.io/pricing).
I would love to hear any feedback, whether it is positive (thanks) or constructive critique (thanks again). I am hoping to be more consistent contributor for bootstrapped and share & learn here.
